languages.text: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Using each non-weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} increases wielders' {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} chances by 5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder

Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This effect stacks.

languages.text: 当装备者使用非攻击类{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，身边每有一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}就提高5%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}可叠加。
languages.original_text: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用非攻击类{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，身边每有一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}就提高5%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}可叠加。

languages.text: 非攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間着用者に隣接する敵1人ごとに{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に5％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g} はスタックできる。
languages.original_text: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 非攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間着用者に隣接する敵1人ごとに{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に5％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g} はスタックできる。

languages.text: Usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no ofensiva proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} por cada enemigo adyacente al portador durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no ofensiva proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} por cada enemigo adyacente al portador durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} es acumulativo.

languages.text: Die Nutzung einer Nichtangriffs-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, und zwar für jeden Feind, der 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang an den Träger grenzt. Dieser Effekt addiert sich.
languages.original_text: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Die Nutzung einer Nichtangriffs-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, und zwar für jeden Feind, der 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang an den Träger grenzt. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} addiert sich.

languages.text: Применение неатакующей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} дает персонажу {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} за каждого противника на соседних клетках на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Применение неатакующей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} дает персонажу {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} за каждого противника на соседних клетках на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

Применение неатакующей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} дает персонажу {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} за каждого противника на соседних клетках на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Le recours à une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} non offensive confère à l'utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de +5 % par ennemi adjacent à sa position pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} est cumulable.
